title: New: Tenterhook – Chemicals (Demo)
body: Move aside Paolo Nutini, Ed Sheeran, Ben Howard, there’s a new kid on the block. London’s **Tenterhook** turned heads with his fantastic first demo, Stereo, and sold out an early headline show. Returning with a second ‘demo’, _Chemicals_ again shows his ability to write radio ready pop songs, marking him out as one of the finest emerging artists of the year.
